channel.title: ArcaneRevolution 317 [PI]
channel.description:
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2re08c2.png[/img]
Client download: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/81818593/Arcane%20Revolution%20Client.jar Website/Webclient: http://arcanerevolution.webs.com/webclient Forums: http://www.arcanerev.smfnew.com/
This server is currently "BRAND NEW". So we suggest any new players that are willing to join please report any active bugs or glitches, thank you!
[b][size=12pt]What's ArcaneRevolution?[/size][/b]
ArcaneRevolution is an amazing entertaining server that's just right for YOU! This server has a lot of amazing features for players and especially Donators, such as Fullscreen mode, 602+ items, Donator Island (Under construction), and more! We try our best to make our players feel welcome. So why not join today!
[b][size=12pt]What ArcaneRevolution serves:[/size][/b]
- 602+ items - Bosses such as Nex, Tormented Demons, Corporal Beast, and more! - Minigames (Nomad's minigame, Mad Goblin, and a brand new minigame Juggernaut, will be released soon! - New fresh home and skills area! - Donator Island (Donator rights, abilities and items!) - and much more!
[size=12pt][b]Screenshots:[/b][/size]
